t: Amazon.com: Walidah Imarisha: Books, biography, log, audiobooks, Kindle
s: Organizers and activists envision, and try to create, such worlds all the time. Walidah Imarisha and adrienne maree brown have brought twenty of them together in the first anthology of short stories to explore the connections between radical speculative fiction and movements for social change.
